fr.upmc.components.interfaces

Interface DataRequiredI.PushI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataOutboundPortI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataOutboundPort, RNGDataOutboundPort, SensorDataOutboundPort, SensorSimulator.BridgeDataOutboundPort
    Enclosing interface:
    DataRequiredI

    public static interface DataRequiredI.PushI
extends OfferedI
    The interface DataRequiredI.PushI contains the signatures of the methods that are called by the offering component to send data to the requiring component.

    Created on : 2011-11-02

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void receive(DataRequiredI.DataI d)
      the method receive is called from the offering component side to make the requiring side receiving a piece of data.

             throws java.lang.Exception
        the method receive is called from the offering component side to make the requiring side receiving a piece of data.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

        d - the piece of data sent by the offering component.

        java.lang.Exception
